com.paypal.selion.utils

Class ServletHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.ServletHelper

  • public final class ServletHelper
extends Object
    A utility class that basically helps in extracting information from Servlet request/responses also has the commonly load the HTML template from resource and write it to the response.

      ServletHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        public static Map<String,String> getParameters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Helps retrieve the parameters and its values as a Map
        Parameters:
        request - A HttpServletRequest that represents the request from which the parameters and their corresponding values are to be extracted.
        Returns:
        A Map that represents the parameters and their values

      • respondAsJsonWithHttpStatus

        public static void respondAsJsonWithHttpStatus(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                               Object response,
                                               int statusCode)
                                        throws IOException
        Sends a HTTP response as a application/json document and with a HTTP status code.
        Parameters:
        resp - A HttpServletResponse object that the servlet is responding on.
        response - The response object which will be serialized to a JSON document
        statusCode - The HTTP status code to send with the response
        Throws:
        IOException

      • respondAsHtmlUsingJsonAndTemplateWithHttpStatus

        public static void respondAsHtmlUsingJsonAndTemplateWithHttpStatus(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                                                   Object response,
                                                                   String resourcePageTemplate,
                                                                   int statusCode)
                                                            throws IOException
        Sends a HTTP response as a text/html document and with a HTTP status code. Injects a json object into the template before responding.
        Parameters:
        resp - A HttpServletResponse object that the servlet is responding on.
        response - The response object which will be serialized to a JSON document.
        resourcePageTemplate - The HTML template to use which is loaded as a classpath resource.
        statusCode - The HTTP status code to send with the response.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • respondAsHtmlUsingArgsAndTemplateWithHttpStatus

        public static void respondAsHtmlUsingArgsAndTemplateWithHttpStatus(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                                                   String resourcePageTemplate,
                                                                   int statusCode,
                                                                   Object... args)
                                                            throws IOException
        Sends a HTTP response as a text/html document and with a HTTP status code. Injects the the provided arguments into the template before responding.
        Parameters:
        resp - A HttpServletResponse object that the servlet is responding on.
        resourcePageTemplate - The HTML template to use which is loaded as a classpath resource.
        statusCode - The HTTP status code to send with the response.
        args - Data which will be inserted in to the template. Data must be typed in accordance with template expectations -- all args are passed to String.format
        Throws:
        IOException

      • respondAsHtmlUsingTemplateWithHttpStatus

        public static void respondAsHtmlUsingTemplateWithHttpStatus(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                                            String resourcePageTemplate,
                                                            int statusCode)
                                                     throws IOException
        Sends a HTTP response as a text/html document and with a HTTP status code.
        Parameters:
        resp - A HttpServletResponse object that the servlet is responding on.
        resourcePageTemplate - The HTML template to use which is loaded as a classpath resource.
        statusCode - The HTTP status code to send with the response.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • respondAsHtmlUsingTemplate

        public static void respondAsHtmlUsingTemplate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                              String resourcePageTemplate)
                                       throws IOException
        Sends a HTTP response as a text/html document. Replies with HTTP status code 200 OK
        Parameters:
        resp - A HttpServletResponse object that the servlet is responding on.
        resourcePageTemplate - The HTML template to use which is loaded as a classpath resource.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • respondAsHtmlWithMessage

        public static void respondAsHtmlWithMessage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                            String message)
                                     throws IOException
        Utility method used to display a message when re-direction happens in the UI flow. Uses the template MESSAGE_RESOURCE_PAGE_FILE
        Parameters:
        resp - A HttpServletResponse object that the servlet is responding on.
        message - Message to display.
        Throws:
        IOException
